newsitem.title: USA: UniComp wins British Telecomm contract.
newsitem.headline: UniComp wins British Telecomm contract.

text.p: UniComp Inc said on Friday its CMI subsidiary won a contract from British Telecommunications plan worth an estimated $300,000 for the support of its desktop environment throughout Northern Ireland.
British Telecomm also named CMI an authorized dealer for its portfolio of network services, UniComp said.
The two would also work together on British Telecomm's CampusWorld project, which provides secure Internet access for the education sector throughout the United Kingdom, UniComp said.
UniComp develops, markets and supports platform-migration application and payment processing software products for Unix-based computer systems and point of transaction processors worldwide.
